directions.step:
Brush chicken with mayonaise: coat with combined remaining ingredients. Place in 9+13 inch bakiang dish. Bake at 350Â° 1 hour or until tender.
NOTES : Variations Substitute 1 pound fish fillets for chicken.. Reduce mayo to 1/3 cup, crumbs to 1/2 cup and parmesan cheese to 1/4 cup. Reduce baking time to 30 minutes or until fish flakes easily with fork. Recipe by: Kay Hitchcock
Posted to TNT Recipes Digest, Vol 01, Nr 924 by "Kay L. Hitchcock" <HITCHCOC_K@popmail.firn.edu> on Jan 09, 1998
